title: Channel Check In: PVK Convo, Paul Rossi, Meetup Greek Section of Zamm, Manly Hall & the Social Level
description:
Great convo with Paul VanderKlay - Thanks, Paul!: https://youtu.be/60UvdaKmCV4

Manly P. Hall samples from: https://youtu.be/2SH1jNAV-pI

Beginning is my brief overview of MOQ: https://youtu.be/RcGjfqKnU7U

ZaMM Meetup next Saturday beginning of last part: https://www.meetup.com/zen-and-the-art-of-motorcycle-maintenance-reading-group/events/278270920/


Channel Check In: PVK Convo, Meetup Greek Section of Zamm, Manly Hall and the Social Level
